text:
Hello experts!
We're looking for an Marketing Automation expert on the senior end. It's a fully remote position - our company is about 2/3rd remote already.
It's a long term position - working close with the entire team and our clients. Working with both strategic challenges aswell as operational.
If you fit the description and it looks interesting, apply here :+1: We're located in Sweden
<http://karriar.brightvision.se/jobs/1019302-marketing-automation-specialist-for-inbound-agency>

Hi all - I'm seeking a freelance developer to create an email template (coded, not drag and drop). Project is due Tuesday or Wednesday next week. I've pre-populated a SOW. Please note we pay through <http://bill.com|bill.com>. We estimate the project would take between 4-6 hours. Please DM me if you're interested in taking this on. I will provide you with all the CSS values in terms of appearance and function. This is the first email of many that we would like to have work done. Thanks!
